comment.author: 24469639@N00
comment._content: This remains, as far as I can tell, part of the British Embassy in Paris, at 39 Rue De Faubourg, St Honore, Paris. You can see practically the same view on Google Streetview.... The lights have changed (although similar) but other than that it's pretty much the same today as then.
